args: Cool. Courtyard looks clear.\nNext up on my route is...
You on patrol, Linus? Good lookin' out.\nThat's why you and I are TEAM JUSTICE!
Uh, last I checked, I'm not on team\nanything. Not that saying that to you\nis gonna make any difference.
That's right! You've been DRAFTED, Linus!\nThat heart of yours and the way it BURNS\nfor justice... The team NEEDED you!
Give it a rest, man. That whole schtick\nis so embarrassing.
Anyway, what are you up to? You wanna\ngo on patrol together again or something?
Yeah, please! Oh, but before that...
I've added a couple of fresh faces to\nTeam Justice! Let me introduce you.
I'm Eirene. Tactical command is my forte.
Finni here. Crushing baddies is MY forte.
Now that we've settled in at the Halidom,\nwe figured we'd make ourselves useful.
As soon as we caught wind of a public\nsecurity unit called Team Justice, we\ncouldn't sign up fast enough!
I was BORN to feed knuckle sandwiches to\nevildoers. Just point me toward 'em.
I dunno if we're organized enough to be\ncalled a ＂public security unit,＂ but I guess\nif the shoe fits...
In practical terms, though, it's not what\nyou two are thinking—
All RIGHT! The time to smite villains is\nnigh. Away we fly, my friends!
Hey, wait! *sigh* I guess once we do a\nlittle actual patrolling, they'll figure it out.
My eyes never fail to spot wrongdoing.\nTime for a JUSTICE SEARCH!
You sure like to use that word.\nWhat do you mean by it, anyway?
I'm GLAD you asked! I speak, of course,\nof the righteous spirit that blazes within—\nof the resolution to never tolerate evil!
You had me at ＂righteous.＂ Sign me UP!
Done and done. I KNEW you androids had\ngood heads on your mechanical shoulders!\nNow, let's do this thing. Ready, set, go!
You're both entirely too noisy. Our enemies\nare going to hear us and end up escaping.
But my passion! It cannot be quenched\nonce it springs forth!
You can hear those knuckleheads makin' a\nracket from a mile away. Sheesh. Really\ncan't let 'em find me right now, though...
Huh. Seems kinda like they're arguin'\nabout something. Better seize this chance!
Both of you, quiet down. Moving stealthily\nto evade enemy detection is Tactics 101.
I suppose if we're talking about fighting\nand winning, you're not wrong.
But keeping the peace is about more than\ncombat.
Stop right there, Ranzal!\nYou're sneaking food again!
Ah, you all! Please, catch Ranzal!\nI've got a lecture with his name on it.
Food theft is unconscionable! Deplorable!\nWe cannot let this injustice stand!
Simulation complete. Enemy escape route\nanalyzed. Commencing ambush operation.
Ain't it a little overkill sending androids\nafter me?! C'mon, give a guy a breaaak!
GOTCHA! And now Cleo is going to have\nWORDS with you!
Tch... Shoulda just stopped when I saw\nyou guys.
Hm. It would seem our mere presence\nmade Ranzal hesitant about his actions.
Remember what I was talking about\nbefore, Eirene? I got cut off, but this\nis exactly what I was getting at.
In this case, it was actually a GOOD thing\nthat our ＂enemy＂ knew we were there.
See, some foul deeds can be nipped in the\nbud before they ever happen. The IDEA of\nbeing caught and scolded can be enough.
In other words, we serve as a deterrent.\nNow I understand.
All of the noise you and Finni were making\nserved to intimidate potential enemies.
Makes sense to me. It's like pressuring\nan enemy on the front line until they lose\ntheir will to fight.
Luckily for us, that's totally my M.O.!\nJust leave it to me, Eirene.
Gladly. Go with Karl when he gets back.\nYou two have my blessing this time.
Guh. Team Justice at nine o'clock.\nBetter abort this prank. Back in my\npocket you go, my little ＂party favor＂—
Oh, crap! It exploded! I gotta get away\nfrom this smoke!
Picking up something on my sensors.\nLuca approaching...or not? He fled.
See? He realized we were here and gave\nup on whatever mischief he was up to.
WAH HA HA! D-dammit, I set off my\nchuckleberry smoke bomb...AHA HA!\nG-got myself with...AHA HA HA HA!
I see what happened. He spotted us,\nand in his haste, mishandled the\ninstrument of his tomfoolery.
HA HA HAAA! So long as we draw breath,\nevil shall never flourish!
YAY! Let's keep this justice caravan rolling!
What say we set up a watchtower in the\nsquare to monitor potential wrongdoers?
Nothing shall escape the watchful eye\nof our HYPER JUSTICE SEARCH!
RIGHT?! C'mon, let's get to the square!
Huh? How come? You said you weren't\ngoing to stop us!
There are limits. I cannot permit\noperations that will inconvenience\npeople in the surrounding area.

If you went ahead with this without
securing permission, Cleo would never
let us hear the end of it. Worse still, she
could even start withholding meals...
Boo. I mean, I'D be fine.\nCan't say the same for Karl, though.
True. A guy can't very well dispense\njustice on an empty stomach...
Just so. If you wish to expand the\nrange of our surveillance, let's just\nsplit up into two groups instead.
Oh! We COULD do that! So basically, we'd\nbe running a DOUBLE JUSTICE SEARCH!
I move we make it even cooler\nand call it a TWIN JUSTICE SEARCH!
We'll decide on a name later.\nThe operation comes first.
Fair enough. Let's do this, Eirene!
I've gotta say, Eirene really does have a\nknack for tactical stuff.
Guess that wasn't empty bluster earlier.
Y'know what? I think we're gonna make\na heck of a team. I'm hyped for this now!

As you should be! I picked each and every
one of you because I could sense how
brightly your spirits burn with—stop me
if you've heard this one before—JUSTICE!
And with that, my Karl senses are tingling.\nIt's you and me, Linus! Let us away in\nsearch of evil to smite!
Right! Just, uh, don't smite 'em TOO hard.
